title: Live Work and Play at Channel Mission Bay!
posting_body: Channel Mission Bay offers remarkable amenities, unparalleled resident services and contemporary apartments just south of China Basin and Oracle Park.
Visit our website: <URL> to view our availability and pricing, take a 3D Tour of this apartment or schedule your preference of a virtually guided or self-guided tour.
We can't wait to show you what Channel Mission Bay has in store as your new home!
Pricing may vary based on lease terms, move-in date, availability, and is subject to change at any time.
Offered prices are for base rent only as other changes, fees, terms, and conditions may apply.
Square footage, amenities, and floor plan listed may vary between individual units and are subject to availability.
Deposits may fluctuate based on credit, rental history, income, and other qualifying standards.
Photos are representative of our community, and may not be the exact home advertised.
Please reach us to view and select your new home!

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
Looking for comfort and style in the great City by the Bay?
Get your move on to Channel Mission Bay Apartments, a LEED gold certified community.
The modern interiors are airy and sleek with clean lines and artisanal finishes.
A freshwater pool; a fitness club where you can firm, burn, and re-energize; endless options for hanging out and gathering-all make Channel anything but standard issue living.
Transit, chic eateries, and boutiques are all nearby and distinctly urban.
Sure, you have a lot on your plate.
But at Channel Mission Bay, you've got everything you need to keep it all in balance.
Explore available apartments at Channel Mission Bay - now complete with the Smart Home package!
Channel Mission Bay, managed by UDR
* Multi Function Study Rooms with Copier and Computers
* RentTrack - Pay Rent Online and Build Credit
Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.
Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.
* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More
